name: cmd-PC1D 6.0
short_description:
cmd-PC1D is a command-line version of the popular solar cell simulation tool PC1D:

https://sourceforge.net/projects/pc1d/

cmd-PC1D 6.0 extends PC1D by (i) including Fermi–Dirac statistics, which can be relevant in regions of high doping, and (ii) adding advanced c-Si models for Auger recombination, band-gap narrowing, and carrier mobility. cmd-PC1D adds flexibility through implementing the calculations in a scripting environment. Finally, cmd-PC1D is the basis for a new graphical user interface called PC1D for Matlab. 

The executables and some documentation can can be downloaded from PV Lighthouse:

http://www.pvlighthouse.com.au/simulation/hosted/cmdPC1D/cmdPC1D.aspx

For more information about the new models in cmd-PC1D 6.0 and verification of results, see the following publication:

http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0927024814003304

Authors: 
Halvard Haug and Birger Retterstøl Olaisen
Institute for Energy Technology, 
Kjeller, Norway
summary: cmd-PC1D is an updated, command-line version of PC1D
